Interface Drawable

public interface Drawable
a collection of common Turtle graphics methods d oberle 2/2024

  • Method Details

    • backward

      long backward(double distance)
      Moves the turtle backward by the distance without changing its direction.
      Parameters:
      distance - distance to move backward
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • clear

      void clear()
      Clears all the drawing that a turtle has done but all the turtle settings remain the same. (color, location, direction, shape)

    • distanceTo

      double distanceTo(double x, double y)
      Gets the distance from the turtle to another position at (x,y).
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of target location
      y - y coordinate of target location
      Returns:
      distance between turtle's current location and another position at (x,y)

    • dot

      long dot(Color color, double dotSize)
      Put a dot on the canvas of a particular color and size.
      Parameters:
      color - color of dot
      dotSize - diameter of the dot
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • forward

      long forward(double distance)
      Moves the turtle forward by the distance.
      Parameters:
      distance - distance to move forward
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • getDirection

      double getDirection()
      Gets the direction the turtle is facing neglecting tilt.
      Returns:
      direction in degrees

    • getPenColor

      Color getPenColor()
      Gives back the turtle's pen color.
      Returns:
      the color of the line that the turtle will draw.

    • getPenWidth

      double getPenWidth()
      Gives back the turtle's pen width
      Returns:
      the width of the turtle's trail

    • getX

      double getX()
      Gets the x-coordinate of the turtle.
      Returns:
      x-coordinate

    • getY

      double getY()
      Gets the y-coordinate of the turtle.
      Returns:
      y-coordinate

    • goTo

      long goTo(double x, double y)
      Sets the position of a turtle.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate
      y - y coordinate
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • hide

      long hide()
      Hides the turtle but it can still draw.
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • home

      long home()
      Moves the turtle to (0,0) and facing east.
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • isAt

      boolean isAt(int x, int y)
      Determines if a turtle is covering a screen position
      Parameters:
      x - x screen coordinate
      y - y screen coordinate
      Returns:
      true if this turtle is at the indicated screen position.

    • left

      long left(double angle)
      Turns the turtle left by the number of indicated degrees.
      Parameters:
      angle - angle in degrees
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • moveColorTo

      long moveColorTo(Color targetColor, int numSteps)
      Sets the turtle's path color to one that is similar to its current one, but moving towards a target color.
      Parameters:
      targetColor - Color that we want to move our penColor towards.
      numSteps - the number that we are allowed to change the R,G,B values by
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • penColor

      long penColor(Color penColor)
      Sets the turtle's path color.
      Parameters:
      penColor - Color of the turtle's path.
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • penDown

      long penDown()
      Puts the turtle's pen down so it will draw on the screen as it moves.
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • penWidth

      long penWidth(double width)
      Sets the width of the turtles path
      Parameters:
      width - width of the turtles path
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • penUp

      long penUp()
      Picks the turtle's pen up so it won't draw on the screen as it moves.
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • right

      long right(double angle)
      Turns the turtle right by the number of indicated degrees.
      Parameters:
      angle - angle in degrees
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • setDirection

      long setDirection(double direction)
      Sets the direction the turtle is facing neglecting tilt.
      Parameters:
      direction - angle counter-clockwise from east
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • setPosition

      long setPosition(double x, double y, double direction)
      Sets the position and direction of a turtle.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate
      y - y coordinate
      direction - angle counter-clockwise from east in degrees
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • setShape

      long setShape(String shape)
      Sets the shape of the turtle using the built in shapes ("turtle","square","rectangle","triangle","arrow","circle") or to a image filename.
      Parameters:
      shape - shapename or filename of image
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • show

      long show()
      Makes the turtle visible.
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • speed

      long speed(double delay)
      Sets the speed of the animation.
      Parameters:
      delay - milliseconds it takes to do one action
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • stamp

      long stamp()
      Put a copy of the current turtle shape on the canvas.
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • turnTowards

      long turnTowards(double x, double y)
      Sets the direction in such a way that it faces (x,y)
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of target location
      y - y coordinate of target location
      Returns:
      state change timestamp

    • undo

      void undo(int steps)
      Undo turtle state changes.
      Parameters:
      steps - the number of state changes to remove

    • undo

      void undo()
      Undo the last turtle state change.
